name: Love Escape!! -the Secret at the Universe
name_original: Love Escape!! -the Secret at the Universe
description:
You were locked into a room which is in the end of the solar system for some reason.
Can you solve many puzzles hidden in the room, and escape!?
The touching end is waiting for you. Please check it with your eyes!

Love Escape! is a room escape game with story that contains elements of fantasy and mystery. (You can skip the story, and enjoy only escape.)

This game is the sequel of "Love Escape!"
But even if you have not played the previous work, you can enjoy it immediately because it contains "Previously on Love Escape".

You can download "Love Escape!" from an upper tab immediately, so please play from it if you'd like!

･The stage is pretty and attractive room. Not only that, this game is very honestly and orthodox. So you may feel completely satisfied when the puzzle is solved!

･The first in the all escaping games!? You can surely escape with the walk-through with the system of taking off the paper!

･The operation is very simple, you need only to tap and swipe. Everybody can enjoy soon with "How to play guide".

･This game has Auto save system. So you can play it anytime in your spare time.

･With handwriting memo function, you can note the worrisome things soon.

･Characters are very individual. The pretty and mysterious alien also appears!

[The Characters]
･Rumi Kroto
Your girlfriend.
She has all of beauty, kindness, and intelligence, so she is respected from both men and women.
However, she has a great secret that could not say to anybody.
It is only you who can save her from the sorrow!
The reason of her strange hairstyle becomes clearly……!
The favorite food is a orange.

･Toma Nicks
Your classmate.
The most handsome man in the school, so he is very popular among girls.
In fact, He is Rumi's brother.
He is planning something with her.
He looks a cool-headed man, but what is his true character?
The favorite food is a baked sweet potato.

･Angela Fafa
???
The favorite food is a marshmallow.
